attributes.action: Mr.& Mrs. B. Stamper Pull the young men & women out of Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You will never beat them.THE terrorist is like a mushroom spawn.When one goes, another four will emerge.It is a totally futile exercise. Far better to spend the money in making our island more secure.Put more restrictions on people coming here.How many more families are going through the agony of losing a young man or young woman? The youngsters joined the Armed Forces to defend Queen and country not to be blown to pieces by a roadside bomb They have no chance of defending themselves!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
